title: Zeitger King 3/30: Sophie Brussaux, John Krasinsky, 30 days, Instacart
itunes:title: Zeitger King 3/30: Sophie Brussaux, John Krasinsky, 30 days, Instacart
description:
On this edition of the Zeitger King Miles and Matt Lieb discuss Drake sharing pictures of his son, Adonis, and partner Sophie Brussaux, John Krasinsky made a video with Steve Carrell, the quarantine will last (at least) 30 more days, and Instacart workers are striking due to working conditions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
